prompt_options.prompt: Create a detailed marketing plan for launching a new tech product aimed at millennials.
Develop a Python script that reads data from a CSV file, processes it, and outputs the results to a new CSV file.
Write a blog post on the benefits of mindfulness meditation, including scientific research and practical tips.
Generate a JavaScript function that validates an email address based on standard format rules.
Compose a speech for a high school graduation ceremony focusing on the themes of resilience and innovation.
Design a landing page for an online course about digital marketing, focusing on user conversion.
Write a concise guide on how to set up a secure VPN for personal use, including configuration tips.
Create a social media content calendar for a month, tailored to a small business in the fashion industry.
Develop a business proposal template that outlines the key elements of a successful startup pitch.
Generate a tutorial on how to integrate a third-party API into a web application using Node.js.
